strings.evolution:
It's okay.
There is still some light left.
strings.affinity:
I can feel a very warm light
coming from within you.
You're full of kindness and strength.
strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Aria is a priestess in service of the Water Crystal who met the Warriors of Light on the Surface World following Master Xande's flood of darkness and destruction. She eventually joins them in order to restore the Water Crystal to pristine condition, and is ultimately successful after an arduous journey. Unfortunately, one of Xande's minions named Kraken would suddenly confront them in battle, unleashing a powerful blast on her.
strings.fusion:
I feel I've grown stronger!
It's all thanks to you. Thank you.
strings.summon:
My name is Aria.
I am the Maiden of Water.

strings.affinity:
I can feel a very warm light
coming from within you.
You're full of kindness and strength.
strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Aria is a priestess in service of the Water Crystal. When Master Xande uses his powers to flood the world in darkness, the Warriors of Light offer Aria their aid aboard a wrecked ship on the Surface World. Aria then pleads for them to use the Water Crystal to return the world to normal in exchange for guiding them to the Temple of Water. She has no qualms about what dangers may befall her as long as she can complete her mission.
strings.fusion:
I will use this power to save the crystals,
and then the world!
strings.summon:
...Wh-where am I?
Huh? What is it, this light coming from your hearts...!

strings.evolution:
Fight back the darkness,
and bring peace to this world
once again!
strings.affinity:
I can feel a very warm light
coming from within you.
You're full of kindness and strength.
strings.description: A young girl hailing from another world where tales are passed down of the Crystals and the Warriors of Light. Aria is a priestess in service of the Water Crystal who set off to the Temple of Water on the Surface World with the Warriors of Light to restore the Water Crystal to pristine condition. She is ultimately successful after an arduous journey,  but suffers a powerful and fatal blast at the hands of one of Master Xande's minions, Kraken. As she breathed her last breath, she pleaded for the Warriors of Light to banish the darkness, and restore peace to the world.
strings.fusion:
Having received so much power from you,
I feel that now I too can help
you out!
strings.summon:
I am a maiden in service of the crystal.
It seems the crystals of this world, too,
are in danger.
